Package io.github.ai4ci.config.setup

Interface AgeStratifiedDemography

All Superinterfaces:
DemographicConfiguration, LocationAwareDemography, Serializable
@Immutable public interface AgeStratifiedDemography extends LocationAwareDemography
Age stratified demographic configuration and helpers.

This interface describes a simple age stratified demography used during setup and baselining. It supplies an empirical age distribution and a function expressing the odds of contact as a function of age difference. Implementations are used when creating person stubs and when computing relationship strengths between agents.

Downstream uses include setup and builder code such as DefaultModelBuilder.setupOutbreak(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiableOutbreak, io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.SetupConfiguration, io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler) and per‑person baselining in DefaultPersonBaseliner.baselinePerson(io.github.ai4ci.abm.ImmutablePersonBaseline.Builder, io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person, io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler). The createPersonStub(Outbreak) helper samples ages for new Person instances during setup.

Author:
Rob Challen

  • Field Details

    • DEFAULT

      static final io.github.ai4ci.config.setup.ImmutableAgeStratifiedDemography DEFAULT
      Sensible default age stratified demography used in examples and tests.

      The default supplies a simple age distribution and an odds function that describes relative contact likelihood by age difference. Tests and examples may rely on this instance as a compact baseline.

  • Method Details

    • adjustedProbabilityContact

      default double adjustedProbabilityContact(double p, Person one, Person two)
      Adjust a base contact probability by the age difference between two people.

      This helper converts the supplied base probability p into an adjusted probability using the normalised age‑difference odds ratio. The odds ratio is applied using Conversions.scaleProbabilityByOR(double, double) to preserve valid probability semantics.

      Parameters:
      p - base contact probability
      one - source person
      two - target person
      Returns:
      a probability adjusted for age-based contact odds

    • createPersonStub

      default io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiablePerson createPersonStub(Outbreak outbreak)
      Create a modifiable person stub and populate the person's age from the configured age distribution.

      This helper is a convenience used during outbreak setup when the builder needs to create a population quickly. Downstream callers include the setup stage in DefaultModelBuilder. The returned ModifiablePerson has an ImmutablePersonDemographic with an age sampled from getAgeDistribution().

      Specified by:
      createPersonStub in interface DemographicConfiguration
      Specified by:
      createPersonStub in interface LocationAwareDemography
      Parameters:
      outbreak - the owning outbreak used to attach the created person
      Returns:
      a modifiable person with a sampled age demographic

    • getAgeDistribution

      EmpiricalDistribution getAgeDistribution()
      The demographics of the population.
      Returns:
      an empirical cumulative distribution describing population ages

    • getNormalisedOddsContactFromAgeDifference

      @Default default SimpleFunction getNormalisedOddsContactFromAgeDifference()
      Normalised odds function for age difference.

      When getOddsContactFromAgeDifference() is an EmpiricalFunction this method returns a function that has been normalised against the joint age distribution. The normalisation produces a baseline odds function suitable for combining with other contact modifiers.

      Returns:
      a normalised odds function for age difference

    • getOddsContactFromAgeDifference

      SimpleFunction getOddsContactFromAgeDifference()
      Odds ratio function for making a contact given absolute age difference.

      The function returns a non‑negative odds ratio for a given absolute age difference; callers typically normalize or combine this function with other contact modifiers. If the implementation is an EmpiricalFunction it will be normalised by getNormalisedOddsContactFromAgeDifference().

      Returns:
      a function mapping age difference to odds ratio

    • getRelationshipStrength

      default double getRelationshipStrength(Person source, Person target, Sampler sampler)
      Compute relationship strength between two people, incorporating age effects.

      The default implementation delegates to LocationAwareDemography.getRelationshipStrength(Person,Person,Sampler) then scales the result by the age‑difference adjusted probability via adjustedProbabilityContact(double, Person, Person). This is the canonical place to combine location and demographic contact modifiers.

      Specified by:
      getRelationshipStrength in interface DemographicConfiguration
      Specified by:
      getRelationshipStrength in interface LocationAwareDemography
      Parameters:
      source - the source person
      target - the target person
      sampler - a sampler used for any stochastic elements in the base relationship strength
      Returns:
      a relationship strength used as an odds/probability modifier
